i wish i could speak another language.
I used to be a farmer, but I had to give up the farm to pursue my passion for teaching.
my parents met at woodstock.

content.text: What is something you enjoy doing in your spare time?
I used to be a farmer, but I had to give it up to pursue my passion for teaching.
Oh, that sounds like an interesting career.
It was! I miss the fresh air and the animals, but I really love helping people learn.
That's great! I've always thought about teaching myself.
It's a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
What kind of things do you teach?
I teach math and science at the high school level.
Oh, that's cool! I always struggled in math.
It's not for everyone, but it's important to have a basic understanding of math.
Yes, it is. It's used in so many different things.
That's what I tell my students!
What's your favorite thing about teaching?
Seeing my students learn and grow. It's so rewarding to know that I've made a difference in their lives.
That's a great feeling! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I do my best
